alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.walkto.Text: Toggles movement animation between normal behavior(distance-based)/always walk/always run/always sprint.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.shiftc.Text: Makes Shift + Click send character walking to destination instead of walk/run/sprint being determined based on distance. Ignores walk toggle state.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.hidese.Text: Hide selection circles around characters during exploration
Hides selection circles around characters during exploration.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.highli.Text: Toggles partial highlighting of map objects and bodies with loot. To highlight the rest, press normal highlight key.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.partia.Text: Partial highlighting default state. On = load into game, partial highlight toggled enabled, Off = disabled
Makes partial highlight show names of most alive NPCs.

alterasc.enhancedcontrols.feature.rotate.Text: Rotate camera with right mouse button
Rotate camera with right mouse button instead of middle. You WILL lose some functionality normally done with RMB. See description.
